name: Phobia (itch) (natalieharris)
description:
Phobia is a Survival Horror game inspired by the video game Silent Hill.

You wake up in an abandoned, haunted asylum where creatures from your wildest nightmares are looking to kill you. Face your Phobias, find a way out, and stay alive. Only when you find the key to escape can you feel free.

You have a gun, a map, and a flashlight that does not run out of batteries. There will be ammunition and health bags to be gathered to help you stay alive, as well as keys that open rooms with multiple items and the final key to exit the asylum and beat the game. Killing creatures gains points, so challenge yourself and your friends to beat the high score. This was a Solo project for a class, so if there are any bugs, let me know and I'll do my best to fix it.
